participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and nurturing, always ready to help others with a smile.
participant_1.background: i attend church every week. i have a dogs. i work as a school teacher. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors.

participant_2.name: Jake

participant_2.background: i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i compete in dog agility classes.
